diff_hunk:
@@ -369,7 +373,11 @@ def _script_graph(fn, _frames_up=0):
 
 def script(fn, optimize=True, _frames_up=0):
     graph = _script_graph(fn, _frames_up=_frames_up + 1)
-    return functools.wraps(fn)(torch._C.GraphExecutor(graph, optimize))
+    mod = ScriptModule()
+    mod._create_method_from_graph('forward', graph)
+    # Forward docstrings
+    mod.__doc__ = fn.__doc__
+    return mod
body:
@apaszke I just pushed an update that reduces the overhead by doing the `forward()` method lookup in C++, thus we don't incur pybind11 overhead twice. New timing (same benchmark):

Before
```
time elapsed: 0.15010666847229004
```

After
```
time elapsed: 0.16915202140808105
```
